LanguageData.ARA_CreepyCrawly.degreeDatas.0.label: Arthropod Insect
LanguageData.ARA_CreepyCrawly.degreeDatas.0.descripti: {PAWN_nameDef} is a giant arthropod insect. Its multiple appendages, reflective exoskeleton, and wriggling, segmented body are enough to trigger a strong sense of primal fear in humans.\n\nWait, you didn't actually think they were a bunch of beautiful girls, did you?
